about_the_game:
Hexforger is a fast-paced roguelite in which you cast magic by combining the three primordial orbs. Craft and upgrade powerful spells in the heat of battle. Loot treasures hidden within the rifts. Die, and spend hard-earned gold to return stronger than ever. The realms are yours to conquer.

A UNIQUE WAY TO FIGHT

As an Hexforger, your weaponry comes from the elements of Ice, Storm and Fire. By wielding them, you can cast a vast array of spells amid the chaos to vanquish the demonic hordes. Will you summon the Reapers to fight for you ? Or perhaps you will call upon a Tornado to send your foes flying before burning them alive with an Eruption. The choice is yours.

POWER UNLIMITED

Destroying fiends is not only a need for survival, but also a mean to grow more powerful. Gaining experience, your spells will gain potency. Persevere and grant them a surprise. A single meteor was clearly enough, but what about three ?

DEATH ? A FAILURE ?

Just another opportunity. Slaying your foes not only comes with power, but also with gold. Who could have known it the hold the key to upgrades unfazed by death itself ? Still, be sure to empty your pouch, or entering the realms will do it for you.

CONQUER THE REALMS

Experience the best the realms have to offer. Open yourself to many cultures and locations. From the bloodthirsty corrupted orcs to the banished ones, an exotic journey awaits you. Be the one to crush them all.
